mapper.sql: user_id , openid, id_card, user_number, user_pwd, user_name, user_gender, user_phone, user_address, user_credit, is_delete, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_BY
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, openid, id_card, user_number, user_pwd, user_name, user_gender, user_phone, user_address, user_credit, is_delete, CREATED_TIME, CREATED_BY) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into user
user_id,
openid,
id_card,
user_number,
user_pwd,
user_name,
user_gender,
user_phone,
user_address,
user_credit,
is_delete,
CREATED_TIME,
CREATED_BY,

#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update user
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_credit = #{userCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_pwd = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_credit = #{userCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT m.user_id as userId, m.openid as openid, m.id_card as idCard, m.user_number as userNumber, m.user_pwd as userPwd, m.user_name as userName, m.user_gender as userGender, m.user_phone as userPhone, m.user_address as userAddress, m.user_credit as userCredit, m.is_delete as isDelete, DATE_FORMAT(m.CREATED_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createdTime, m.CREATED_BY as createdBy FROM user m where m.is_delete = 0 and m.openid = #{openid}

SELECT m.user_id as userId, m.openid as openid, m.id_card as idCard, m.user_number as userNumber, m.user_pwd as userPwd, m.user_name as userName, m.user_gender as userGender, m.user_phone as userPhone, m.user_address as userAddress, m.user_credit as userCredit, m.is_delete as isDelete, DATE_FORMAT(m.CREATED_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createdTime, m.CREATED_BY as createdBy FROM user m where m.user_status = 0 and m.user_id = #{userId}
